04CC2E592A648F06.title: I have read this page multiple times

display.title: Important Information
description: Be sure to &&aproperly&&r read &&lthis&&r quest - it has some &&dimportant information&&r that will remain relevant all throughout your playthrough.
Informative quests such as this will appear in the chapter they are unlocked. You can also consult the &&b"Guides + More"&&r quest tab if you feel like you're forgetting something.

The quest structure is intended to guide you through all the major milestones in &&aGregTech&&r progression. Every single quest should be &&2beneficial&&r to look at in some way - if something is 100% optional, we'll mention it, so don't worry about missing anything crucial.

There are no drawbacks to playing this modpack in &&dPeaceful&&r - in fact, we highly urge you to do so, as there is little benefit from hostile mobs. Feel free to also to use &&o/keepInventory&&r, &&o/sethome&&r, and abuse minimap teleport as you see fit.

Although we won't force these settings onto you, we &&4don't&&r intend for this modpack to provide a punishing &&eSurvival&&r experience, but more so help you learn the ins and outs of &&aGregTech CEu&&r.

Lastly, it's good to be &&lsavvy&&r with &&eEMI.&&r &&aGregTech&&r items will frequently have several recipes, so you should never assume the first recipe &&eEMI&&r displays is the most efficient. "Professional" &&eEMI&&r usage involves the &&bidentification of patterns&&r in autogenerated recipes (example: all the Iron related items &&6macerate&&r into Iron Dust).

When complex recipes arise - and we won't sugarcoat, &&aGTCEu&&r can be intimidating - we'll make sure to direct you towards the more &&5efficient routes&&r. However, we urge you to experiment on your own. It's no fun to follow the quest book by rote, right?

subtitle.text: Read this, and read it again!
